Name: V-Skin
About the game: V-Skin is a tool that combines Live2D and 3D VTuber Capture facial expressions through WebCam and IOS applications, and use somatosensory devices to make body movements perfectly combine the human and the virtual character. The basic version will be released for free, you can use all the functions of Live2D and some 3D functions, and can be used directly on live broadcasts without restrictions. The free version covers all of the following features 3D and 2D models supported High-quality face capture Live2D high-resolution, clear rendering High degree of freedom in setting of scenes and props Enables props to track the movement of characters Face capture is possible with either IOS or webcam Freely set face compensation parameters to show the most suitable expression changes Commercial use allowed (YouTube, Twitch...) Experience 5 minutes to use our developed screen capture function that does not display the operation background If you want to lift the five-minute limit, you can purchase our live streaming DLC ​​(V-Skin Broadcast Unlimited Pack), you can use this feature indefinitely and make our subsequent development smoother. In addition, for the convenience of home use, we have also developed an alternative solution for users who do not have somatosensory equipment to allow 3D characters to perform a certain degree of upper body movements through webcam, making the character movements on the live broadcast more flexible. In the future, we will continue to add functions and supported devices through DLC. Interested players can continue to pay attention to our subsequent updates. If you need to customize the functions, you want to customize, support the development of equipment, or have questions about use, please contact us.
